logo.name: PawsWalk Logo
logo.description: The logo for PawsWalk representing friendly and professional dog walking services

sections.title: Welcome to PawsWalk!
sections.subtitle: Your Trusted Dog Walking Companion.
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Join a community of trusted walkers and dog owners. Whether you're looking for a walker or wish to become one, PawsWalk simplifies the process.

images.name: Friendly Walker with Dogs
images.description: A cheerful dog walker with several dogs enjoying a walk in the park.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: The Heart Behind PawsWalk
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: *PawsWalk* was founded with the vision to connect dog lovers and pet owners in a secure, easy-to-use platform. Our mission is to ensure every dog gets the care and exercise they need, delivered by registered and reviewed walkers in your community.

images.name: Community of Pet Lovers
images.description: An engaging backdrop image showcasing a vibrant community of dog lovers.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Flexible and Reliable Dog Walking
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **For Dog Walkers:**
  - Self-registration
  - Manage your availability and pricing
  - Confirm or reject walk requests easily
- **For Dog Owners:**
  - Register with ease
  - Schedule walks for your pets with matched walkers
  - Review past appointments and walkers
- **Secure Payments:**
  - Convenient payments via trusted 3rd party billing
  - Transparently see your payment history

images.name: Service Overview
images.description: A graphic summarizing the registration and usage process for both walkers and owners.

sections.title: Pricing
sections.subtitle: Affordable Plans Tailored to Your Needs
sections.name: PricingSection
sections.label: Pricing
sections.content: Walkers set their own rates ranging between **$10** and **$50**, tailored to dog size and needs. Pick the perfect plan for your furry friend today!

images.name: Price Tag Icon
images.description: Icon indicating competitive pricing options available for users.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Get In Touch With Our Team
sections.name: ContactSection
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Phone: (123) 456-7890  
Email: support@pawswalk.com  
Address: 123 Doggo Lane, Petville
Contact us for any inquiries or support needs. We are here to assist you and your furry companions!

images.name: Location Map
images.description: Map showing the physical location of PawsWalk headquarters.

sections.title: Meet Our Team
sections.subtitle: Dedicated Dog Lovers Like You
sections.name: TeamSection
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our dedicated staff includes fellow dog lovers and experts in pet care who are passionate about building a trusted pet-loving community.

images.name: Dog Walker Headshot
images.description: A profile picture of a successful PawsWalk dog walker.
